name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Moncton Flight College - CYFC Talon Mods

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps to modify Talon's Ops Graphical view for better readability and added features.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a test version for our CYFC base. It is beta only and not meant for public release.
